headline: PNC Multifamily Capital Announces $208 Million Affordable Housing Fund, Increasing Access to Affordable Housing Across the U.S.
summary: PNC Bank, N.A., a tax credit syndication leader, today announced the closing of Low-Income Housing Tax Credit (LIHTC) Fund 98, which is investing more than $208 million in the development and rehabilitation of affordable rental housing across the U.S. The fund includes investments from PNC and seven other financial services and insurance companies, including two investors that are new to PNC's LIHTC funds.
